ECDescription: Pursued a career in Computer Science as a Software Engineer, aiming to develop and engage my creativity through various programming languages and by creating innovative solutions to specific problems.
Participated in the Microblink & Infobip AI Hackathon as part of a team, where we developed and presented 'FraudCrypt,' a solution leveraging LLMs to detect fraudulent email attempts.
Completed a structured learning program in which I had the pleasure of experiencing a real-life working environment while developing a web app with ASP.NET, SQL Server, and Angular.
Attended a one-day workshop exploring the principles of DevOps with Microsoft Azure, gaining in-depth insights into its integration, analytics, and collaborative methodologies.
Attended the .GET Workshop, where I gained hands-on experience with ASP.NET and C#.
Achieved second place in a UI/UX design competition with a concept for a web application designed as a for-profit learning platform connecting students.
